page.title: 18FARM LIFE IN THE BORDERS
page.content: In our area there are many farms. These farms range in size from hundreds of acres to thousands of acres.The majority of farms are either {arable}or{stock farms}or a{combination of both.There are also some{hill sheep farms.The farm we visited is called{ {Gattonside Mains}and has 500 acres.The farm is a{beef unit.}The only{crop grown is{grass}which is used as feeding for the cattle.The farm is at least 100 years old and has been owned by the present farmer for 12 years.On the next page is an interview with the farmer.
